publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3537 Patricia Ferguson: Congratulations to Maryhill, Kelvin and Canal Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates all those nominated and shortlisted for the Evening Times Community Champions Awards; acknowledges the contribution made to their local communities by all the individuals and organisations involved, and applauds the particular efforts of the following winners - Good Morning Glasgow, Hugh and Margaret Tavendale, Mary Anne McIllroy, the staff of Community Central Halls, Remzije Sherifi and the Ruchill Youth Project, Groovy Greens. Supported by: James Kelly*, Bill Butler*, Cathie Craigie*, Mary Mulligan*, George Foulkes*, Trish Godman*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Whitefield*
S3M-3537 Congratulations to Maryhill, Kelvin and Canal Community Champions (lodged on 25 February 2009) Jackie Baillie*

S3M-3537 Patricia Ferguson: Congratulations to Maryhill, Kelvin and Canal Community Champions—That the Parliament congratulates all those nominated and shortlisted for the Evening Times Community Champions Awards; acknowledges the contribution made to their local communities by all the individuals and organisations involved, and applauds the particular efforts of the following winners - Good Morning Glasgow, Hugh and Margaret Tavendale, Mary Anne McIllroy, the staff of Community Central Halls, Remzije Sherifi and the Ruchill Youth Project, Groovy Greens. Supported by: James Kelly, Bill Butler, Cathie Craigie, Mary Mulligan, George Foulkes, Trish Godman, Mr Frank McAveety, Karen Whitefield, Jackie Baillie, Cathy Jamieson*
S3M-3537 Congratulations to Maryhill, Kelvin and Canal Community Champions (lodged on 25 February 2009) David Stewart*
